Address.value: ROOM 2912,29/F.,NEW TECH PLAZA,34 TAI YAU STREET, SAN PO KONG, 0000, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Primega Group conducts its operations in Hong Kong through their operating subsidiary, Primega Construction. Primega Construction is a provider of transportation services that employs environmentally friendly practices with the aim of facilitating reuse of C&D materials and reduction of construction waste. Through Primega Construction, we operate in the Hong Kong construction industry, mainly handling transportation of materials excavated from construction sites. Primega Construction principally provides the following services in Hong Kong 1 soil and rock transportation services, 2 diesel oil trading, and 3 construction works, which mainly includes ELS works and bored piling. We generally provide our services as a subcontractor to other construction contractors in Hong Kong.
